pages.text: $(li)The Lumberjack really loves collect wood in the deep forests.$(br)$(li)It will trade you Saplings, $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beds)Beds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/crate)Crates$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/note_block)Note Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/bookshelf)Bookshelves$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/charm/woodcutter)Woodcutters$(/l) for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and vice versa.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Lumberjack profession if it is near a $(l:patchouli:utility/charm/woodcutter)Woodcutter$(/l).
